name: Bleeding Miniatures
description:
'Bleeding Miniatures' is Louise Annette Smart's debut E.P. released March 30th 2009. Consisting of 6 tracks, the record explores the sonic properties of acoustic instruments and found sound producing a haunting ambient electronic dream. Her use of colour through the harmonic and rhythmic textures is unconventionally beautiful.

Samples of 'Bleeding Miniatures' can be heard at www.myspace.com/louiseannettesmart
